named-query.name: GxMaster.findAllByGxStatusInOrderByCreatedAtAsc
named-query.query: SELECT gm FROM GxMaster gm WHERE gm.gxStatus IN :statuses ORDER BY gm.createdAt ASC

named-query.name: GxMaster.findAllByStatusInOrderByCreatedAtAsc
named-query.query: SELECT gm FROM GxMaster gm WHERE gm.gxStatus IN :statuses ORDER BY gm.createdAt ASC

named-query.name: GxMaster.findAllByProcessingJobId
named-query.query: SELECT gm FROM GxMaster gm JOIN gm.sourceFile fm WHERE fm.processingJob.id = :jobId

named-query.name: GxMaster.updateStatusForJobId
named-query.query: UPDATE GxMaster gm SET gm.gxStatus = :newStatus WHERE gm.sourceFile.processingJob.id = :jobId AND gm.gxStatus IN :statusesToUpdate
